sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Fixes the display column of sys_app_template_dependency_definition</description>
        <name>Fix display columns</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var dictionaryRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
dictionaryRecord.addQuery('name', 'sys_app_template_dependency_definition');
dictionaryRecord.addQuery('element', 'type');
dictionaryRecord.addQuery('display', 'true');
dictionaryRecord.query();

if (dictionaryRecord.next()) {
	dictionaryRecord.setWorkflow(false);
	dictionaryRecord.setValue('display', 'false');
	dictionaryRecord.update();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-06-23 17:55:27</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>e638c3a35b30301083f30f216581c731</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Fix display columns</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Application Templates" source="com.snc.apps_templates">1c2afca83cf1311068bcf327dfe37fff</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_e638c3a35b30301083f30f216581c731</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-06-23 17:56:17</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
